h2_title: Where to Find the Macaque Chief
content: After a second defeat, you'll face him one last time near the end of the chapter, in-between two bouts that you'll have with the end boss, Yellowbrow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Macaque_Chief.md', within the main section titled 'Macaque Chief', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Macaque Chief'.
The content is as follows:
After a second defeat, you'll face him one last time near the end of the chapter, in-between two bouts that you'll have with the end boss, Yellowbrow.
